title: AI Show | Nov 5 | Ignite Recap | Language Services
description:
In this Ignite recap episode Hazem El-Hammamy dives deeper into the announcement made at Ignite regarding Language Services. Text Analytics, QnA Maker and Language Understanding (LUIS) are now unified under Language Services! https://aka.ms/CognitiveServicesFree

Jump to:
00:00 AI Show begins
00:16 Aysegul welcomes Hazem El-Hammamy
00:42 What challenges/problems does Language Cognitive Services address
01:37 Cognitive Services for Language overview:https://aka.ms/AzureLanguage
02:54 What's new in Cognitive Service for Language: https://aka.ms/WhatsNewLanguage
05:52 Language Studio demo: https://aka.ms/AzureLanguageStudio
15:20 Ignite announcement - Text analytics, Question Answering and LUIS under Unified Language Service
